original_text: And at the second time Joseph was made known to his brethren; and Joseph's kindred was made known unto Pharaoh.
korean_text: 또 재차 보내매 요셉이 자기 형제들에게 알려지게 되고 또 요셉의 친족이 바로에게 드러나게 되니라

sentences.original_text: Joseph was made known to his brethren
and Joseph's kindred was made known unto Pharaoh
